idea-plugin.name: DevWerk
idea-plugin.description:
DevWerk is an AI-powered tool window for IntelliJ-based IDEs that generates and applies real project changes via structured CodeOps (file operations), not just chat suggestions.

  • Generate real files and folders (create/update/delete)
  • Structured CodeOps JSON output (reply, code_tree, ops)
  • Works with Ollama, OpenAI GPT, Google Gemini, and optional dedicated backend integration
  • Runs locally; API keys are stored locally
idea-plugin.change-notes: • Initial release: DevWerk tool window with provider settings and CodeOps workflow.
